title: Toledo
knownFor: Medieval walled city known as the 'City of Three Cultures' where Christian, Muslim, and Jewish communities coexisted. Stunning cathedral, El Greco paintings, and narrow cobblestone streets. UNESCO World Heritage Site.
howToGetThere: Bus from Plaza El√≠ptica (50 min, every 20-30 min, recommended) or train from Atocha (30 min). Bus is cheaper and drops you closer to the old town.
